0: The rooms are old and the air conditioning was defect so room got terribly warm
There was no air conditioning in the room so it was very hot and it forced us to open the windows
However if you get a sea view then it makes up for any failings

The restaurant was nothing special staff was overworked the dinning room was noisy eg children using the piano to play and nobody did anything about it and the tables were too close to each other and often in an odd layout
but in France that is what they doPs the settee sofa bed in the room was so old and tatty let down the rest of the rooms ambience
there is no where to sit like a cosy lounge area to watch tv or read or just relax
An over bath shower was not what I would expect at the prices charged and this over bath shower was worse than most
The luggage was left at the front and would be taken to the room
The room was a little outdated although clean mattress was n’t the best
1: A clever way of selling more rooms instead

The property has a good ambiance and a heated indoor pol The bar and restaurant is decent if you do not want to go out The rooms are generally clean The bathroom is well equipped with all of the toiletries we ned The parking was all consumed by non hotel staying people and hence even with parking for hotel patrons we could not park in the hotel premises The WC was very small and had no working exhaust The location is further away from the main area but not a big problem The staff at the reception are not smiling or talking and working like robots
We booked superior sea view room this room was smaller than on the pictures
Newly renovated had proper coffee maker in room as well as fridge for beer
We booked a room with a free bar included in the price
We are very glad that we booked and paid for a sea view room as the rooms looking over to the dunes parking which we almost booked ad appalling views
2: The room was standard cleaned with 2 separate single beds for my 2 big kids

Great hotel great views over the sea and beach easy parking great amenities saltwater pool was great there was a bit of building work going on did not worry use looks like the were improving the hotel with a gym
Comfy bed and pillows tea coffee facilities safe minibar excellent shower and very good water pressure even on top floor two USB charging points and a few mains sockets too
The restaurant was beautiful with stunning views
Enjoyed stay but accessible room compromised following refurbishment
It was a mini break of dreams and I can not thank you enough for the amazing time we experienced
We received a warm welcome on arrival and the hotel has a open feel with a wall of windows with magnificent views to the open sea
Room was more spacious than anticipated bed was really comfortable
